Summary: This is my dog's favorite food!
text: We switched from Rachael Ray's Nutrish to Purina Beneful and my dog couldn't be happier! She actually paces in anticipation of her next meal (I swear she can tell time!) Where she used to look at her food and sigh before eating, now she does a little doggie dance while I fill her bowl and then gulps it down as fast as she can (I tell her to slow down but she doesn't listen to me). I know that there are products out there that are probably healthier for my dog, but with my budget, this is what I can afford. She loves it, she's happy and healthy, and that's good enough for me.
